document.masterDocTitle: Checklist of Dinotrema Foerster, 1863 species of Finland (Hymenoptera, Braconidae, Alysiinae)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Checklist of Dinotrema Foerster, 1863 species of Finland (Hymenoptera, Braconidae, Alysiinae)

subSubSection.paragraph:
Type species:
Dinotrema erythropa
Foerster, 1863.
Diagnosis. Mandibles small, simple, tridentate. Paraclypeal fovea short, not reaching ventral edge of eyes. Vein r1 (r) present and sclerotized; nervulus (cu-a) postfurcal.
Hosts. Dipteran larvae from families Anthomyiidae , Drosophilidae , Phoridae , Platypezidae .

: 1 female, Uusikaupunki, Nystad, 675:319, 13.viii.1917 (W. Hell√©n leg.) (MZH). Sa : 1 female, Mikkeli, Laajalampi, 68392:35140, 20.ix.2015 (M. Koponen leg.) (MZH); 2 females, Mikkeli, Laajalampi, 68400:35143, 24.viii.2015 (M. Koponen leg.) (MZH).
